sentence.Network_en: And they told me their insurance wouldn't cover me unless I wore preventative covering.

sentence.Network_en: Limiting this food marketing is an important preventative strategy for childhood obesity.
sentence.Network_cn: 限制这类食品广告是预防儿童肥胖的一个重要手段.

sentence.Network_en: Nations across the globe have already been taking preventative measures.
sentence.Network_cn: 全球各国已经采取防范措施.

entry.def: Preventative means the same as preventive .

means.word_mean: 1. remedy that prevents or slows the course of an illness or disease;
2. any obstruction that impedes or is burdensome
3. an agent or device intended to prevent conception
2. preventing or contributing to the prevention of disease;
